Note that the `echo = FALSE` parameter was added to the code chunk to prevent printing of the R code that generated the plot.
```{r}
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggspatial)
library(units)
library(nngeo)
```

```{r}
municipalparking <- st_read("https://data.cambridgema.gov/api/geospatial/27w3-catu?method=export&format=KML", quiet=TRUE)

commercialparking <- st_read("https://data.cambridgema.gov/api/geospatial/t8tm-muns?method=export&format=KML", quiet=TRUE)

nhoods <- st_read("https://data.cambridgema.gov/api/geospatial/k3pi-9823?method=export&format=KML", quiet=TRUE)

censusblocks <- st_read("https://data.cambridgema.gov/api/geospatial/gsft-4pvq?method=export&format=KML", quiet=TRUE)
```

```{r}
MA_state_plane <- "+proj=lcc +lat_1=41.71666666666667 +lat_2=42.68333333333333 +lat_0=41 +lon_0=-71.5 +x_0=200000 +y_0=750000 +ellps=GRS80 +units=m +no_defs"

municipalparking <- municipalparking %>%
  st_transform(MA_state_plane)

commercialparking <- commercialparking %>%
  st_transform(MA_state_plane)

nhoods <- nhoods %>%
  st_transform(MA_state_plane)


censusblocks <- censusblocks %>%
  st_transform(MA_state_plane)
```

```{r}
ggplot(censusblocks) +
  geom_sf(fill = "NA", color = "black", size=0.05) +
  geom_sf(data = municipalparking, color = "blue", size = 5) +
  geom_sf(data = commercialparking, color= "red", size = 2) +
  geom_sf(data= nhoods, fill = NA, color = "orange", size=0.3) +
  theme_map() +
  annotation_scale()
```
```{r}
parking_buffer <- st_buffer(municipalparking, dist = 50) %>%
  st_union()

ggplot(parking_buffer) +
  geom_sf() +
  theme_map()
```

```{r}
com_parking <- commercialparking[parking_buffer,]
  
ggplot(parking_buffer) +
  geom_sf() +
  geom_sf(data = commercialparking, 
          color = "darkgreen", 
          size = 0.5) +
  theme_map()
```
